dataset_overview.name: AIMEl-DB
dataset_overview.description: Atomic Properties for 44K small organic molecules

dataset_overview.name: Alchemy
dataset_overview.description: 19,487 organic molecules contain-ing up to 14 heavy atoms from the GDB-17 database with 12 quantum mechanical properties

dataset_overview.name: ANI-1
dataset_overview.description: A collection of non-equilibrium DFT total energy calculations for organic molecules, encompassing approximately 20 million conformations of 57,462 small organic molecules

dataset_overview.name: ANI-1x
dataset_overview.description: The ANI-1x data set includes DFT calculations for approximately 5 million organic molecule conformations

dataset_overview.name: ANI-1ccx
dataset_overview.description: Tthe ANI-1ccx data set is a subset of ANI-1x data set, recomputed with CCSD(T)/CBS level of theory

dataset_overview.name: ANI-2x
dataset_overview.description: Extension of previous developed ANI-1x datasets to include S, F, Cl with non-equilibrium geometries at DFT level

dataset_overview.name: bigQM7ω
dataset_overview.description: Ground-state properties and electronic spectra for over 12,880 molecules with 7 CONF atoms

dataset_overview.name: C7O2H10-17
dataset_overview.description: MD trajectories of 5,000 steps for 113 isomers of C7O2H10

dataset_overview.name: CheMFi
dataset_overview.description: A multifidelity compilation of quantum chemical properties derived from a subset of the WS22 database, featuring 135,000 geometries sampled from nine distinct molecules. It encompasses five different levels of fidelity, each corresponding to a specific basis set size (STO-3G, 3-21G, 6-31G, def2-SVP, def2-TZVP)

dataset_overview.name: ISO17
dataset_overview.description: An extension of C7O2H10-17 data set, consisting of 129 isomers
reference:
@article{schutt2017schnet,
author = {Sch\"{u}tt, K. T. and Kindermans, P.-J. and Sauceda, H. E. and Chmiela, S. and Tkatchenko, A. and M\"{u}ller, K.-R.},
title = {SchNet: a continuous-filter convolutional neural network for modeling quantum interactions},
year = {2017},
isbn = {9781510860964},
publisher = {Curran Associates Inc.},
address = {Red Hook, NY, USA},
booktitle = {Proceedings of the 31st International Conference on Neural Information Processing Systems},
pages = {992–1002},
numpages = {11},
location = {Long Beach, California, USA},
series = {NIPS'17}
}

dataset_overview.name: MD17 and its later versions
dataset_overview.description: \textit{Ab initio} molecular dynamics trajectories collection along with total energy and forces for ten small organic molecules

dataset_overview.name: MD22
dataset_overview.description: MD trajectories for seven systems spanning four major classes of biomolecules and supramolecular structures

dataset_overview.name: MultiXC-QM9
dataset_overview.description: Expands upon QM9 by including data from 76 different DFT functionals alongside three basis sets and a semi-empirical method (GFN2-xTB)

dataset_overview.name: $\nabla^2$DFT
dataset_overview.description: A comprehensive collection of approximately 16 million conformers for around 2 million drug-like molecules

dataset_overview.name: OrbNet Denali
dataset_overview.description: 2.3 million molecules based ChEMBL27 database

dataset_overview.name: PC9
dataset_overview.description: 99,234 distinct molecules, a subset of PubChemQC project selected based on the limitations of QM9 data set (size of up to 9 heavy atoms in the range C, N, O and F)

dataset_overview.name: PubChemQC B3LYP/6-31G*//PM6
dataset_overview.description: A collection of electronic properties for nearly 86 million molecules, encompassing a broad spectrum of essential compounds and biomolecules with molecular weights up to 1000

dataset_overview.name: PubChemQC Database
dataset_overview.description: 3 million molecules optimized for their ground states and over 2 million molecules with low-lying excited states

dataset_overview.name: PubChemQC PM6
dataset_overview.description: PM6 data for 221 million molecules, including optimized geometries and electronic structures

dataset_overview.name: QCDGE
dataset_overview.full_name: Quantum Chemistry Dataset with Ground- and Excited-State Properties
dataset_overview.description: An extensive collection of ground and excited-state properties for 443,106 organic molecules, each containing up to ten heavy atoms, including carbon, nitrogen, oxygen, and fluorine. These molecules are sourced from well-known databases such as QM9, PubChemQC, and GDB-11.

dataset_overview.name: QM1B
dataset_overview.description: One billion conformers for molecules with 9-11 heavy atoms

dataset_overview.name: QM7
dataset_overview.description: Focuses on a subset of 7,165 small organic molecules from the GDB-13 database, providing Coulomb matrices, atomization energies, atomic charge, and Cartesian coordinates

dataset_overview.name: QM7-X
dataset_overview.description: 4.2 million structures of small organic molecules (containing up to seven non-hydrogen atoms) with a rich set of 42 properties

dataset_overview.name: QM7b
dataset_overview.description: An extension of QM7, providing data on 7,211 small organic molecules including 14 properties such as atomization energy, static polarizability, and frontier orbital eigenvalues, calculated using DFT and other quantum chemistry methods

dataset_overview.name: QM8
dataset_overview.description: Provides electronic spectra data for approximately 21,786 small organic molecules, derived from QM9, calculated using TD-DFT and other excited-state methods

dataset_overview.name: QM9
dataset_overview.description: A collection of molecular structures and properties for 134,000 small organic molecules

dataset_overview.name: QM9-G4MP2
dataset_overview.description: Provides highly accurate G4MP2 calculations for the molecular structures within QM9

dataset_overview.name: QM-sym
dataset_overview.description: 135,000 structures with C$_{n\text{h}}$ symmetry

dataset_overview.name: QM-symex
dataset_overview.description: The QM-sym data set has been expanded to include an additional 38,000 molecules, providing valuable information on excited-state properties at TD-B3LYP/6-31G//B3LYP/6-31G(2df,p); Gaussian 09

dataset_overview.name: QM-22
dataset_overview.description: A compilation of molecular data sets specifically curated for DMC calculations of the zero-point state

dataset_overview.name: QMugs
dataset_overview.description: Quantum-mechanical properties of over 665,000 drug-like molecules extracted from the ChEMBL database

dataset_overview.name: SPICE
dataset_overview.description: 2,008,628 conformations of 113,999 drug-like small molecules and proteins

dataset_overview.name: Transition1x
dataset_overview.description: 9.6 million data points, each meticulously generated using DFT calculations with forces and energies for a staggering 10,000 organic reactions

dataset_overview.name: VIB5
dataset_overview.description: Ab initio quantum chemical data for five small polyatomic molecules with significant astrophysical relevance

dataset_overview.name: VQM24
dataset_overview.description: Providing QM properties of 258,242 unique constitutional isomers and 577,705 conformers of varying stoichiometries, focusing on molecules composed of up to five heavy atoms from C, N, O, F, Si, P, S, Cl, Br

dataset_overview.name: WS22 Database
dataset_overview.description: 1.18 million molecular geometries (equilibrium and non-equilibrium) for ten organic molecules containing up to 22 atoms

dataset_overview.name: xxMD
dataset_overview.description: Excited-state molecular dynamics  data set for four molecular systems chosen for their photochemical activity: azobenzene, malonaldehyde, stilbene, and dithiophene

dataset_overview.name: CREMP
dataset_overview.description: Macrocyclic peptides data set containing 4-, 5-, and 6-mer homodetic cyclic peptides.

dataset_overview.name: CREMP-CycPeptMPDB
dataset_overview.description: Macrocyclic peptides data set containing 6-, 7-, and 10-mer cyclic peptides.

dataset_overview.name: GEOM
dataset_overview.description: Conformers for mid-sized organic molecules from QM9 and experimental datasets related to physical chemistry, biophysics, and physiology.

dataset_overview.name: tmQM
dataset_overview.description: Mononuclear transition metal-organic compond complexes datasets consisting 30 transition metals in 3d, 4d, and 5d from groups 3 to 12

dataset_overview.name: COMPAS-1
dataset_overview.full_name: COMputational database of Polycyclic Aromatic Systems-1
dataset_overview.description: Part of the COMPAS project containing cata-condensed polybenzenoid hydrocarbons and various QM properties

dataset_overview.name: COMPAS-2
dataset_overview.full_name: COMputational database of Polycyclic Aromatic Systems-2
dataset_overview.description: Part of the COMPAS project containing cata-condensed poly(hetero)cyclic aromatic molecules and various QM properties

dataset_overview.name: COMPAS-3
dataset_overview.full_name: COMputational database of Polycyclic Aromatic Systems-3
dataset_overview.description: Part of the COMPAS project containing peri-condensed polybenzenoid hydrocarbons

dataset_overview.name: OFF-ON dataset
dataset_overview.full_name: organic fragments from organocatalysts that are non-modular
dataset_overview.description: organic fragments from organocatalysts that are non-modular

dataset_overview.name: revQM9
SPICE-2
dataset_overview.description: Extension of SPICE-1 with additional 20,000 new molecules and 2 new elements: boron and silicon)

dataset_overview.name: FMO-SCOP
dataset_overview.description: protein folds with FMO calculation from SCOP2
